data.title: Remove a folder type from the folder type hierarchy - Manage Documents - Foundation 24.1 - Foundation 24.1 - Ready - Perceptive Content - external
data.meta_description: To remove a folder type from the folder type hierarchy, but not remove the folder type from your system, complete the following procedure.
data.text:
To remove a folder type from the folder type hierarchy, but not remove the folder type from your system, complete the following procedure.

In Management Console, in the left pane, under Select Department, select a department from the list.

In the left pane, click Folder Types, and in the right pane, click the Hierarchy tab.

To remove a subfolder type from the Common Hierarchy, in the Structure pane, under Common Hierarchy, select the subfolder type you want to remove, and then click Remove.

To remove a folder type from the hierarchy defined for a drawer, In the Structure pane, in the Display list, select the name of the drawer from which you want to remove a folder type, select the folder type you want to remove, and then click Remove.

To apply your changes to the hierarchy, click Save.
